scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/jshint lib test && ./node_modules/.bin/jscs lib test && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --recursive --require should -R spec
scripts.setup: mkdir -p ./tmp/data && if [[ ! -f ./tmp/consul ]]; then wget https://dl.bintray.com/mitchellh/consul/0.3.0_$( uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' )_amd64.zip && unzip *.zip && mv ./consul ./tmp/consul && rm *.zip; fi
